title.narrative: Supporting Documentation to a new Danish Programme on Climate Change, Conflict, Displacement and Irregular Migration in Sahel

description.narrative:
The objective of the assignment is to prepare the required supporting documentation for the program document for the new four-year programme.
The assignment is the third and final phase of a project preparation of a new initiative with a budget of DKK 800 million. The assignment will build on a mapping report prepared in 2020 (first phase), and a subsequent identification report and concept note prepared in early 2021 (second phase). It will also take into account comments submitted by the Danida Programme Committee on 20 May 2021. The consultant will dialogue with the partners who have been proposed for the separate engagements under the programme to finalise the needed supporting documentation. Based on the consultations the consultant will prepare the actual annexes/supporting documentation needed to finalise the formulation of the new programme, which will make it ready for implementation
